overview:
Manlio Accardo is the founder and CEO of Sailogy.com since November 2011. Sailogy has the goal of aggregating demand and supply for chartered recreational yachts. Based both in Milan and Naples (Italy) the company launched in spring 2012 and currently features about 2,000 boats in 50 destinations.

Prior to starting his tech venture in Milan, Italy, he was a Director of Marketing for Ferrari and previously he was at Bain & Company.

Manlio received his MBA from the London Business School in 2006 and his BA in International Business from the Nottingham University.

Eager sailor and tennis player, Manlio also enjoys adventurous road-trips; in fact he drove a high performance car deep into the Canadian Arctic Circle and a motorbike across Vietnam.
